content.p: Colombia's national scholarships and funding programme COLFUTURO offers scholarships, grants and loans for high-achieving Colombian students to study postgraduate masters and PhD degree programmes in a variety of subject areas at selected universities in other countries. The University of Nottingham is proud to be one of COLFUTURO's partner universities in the UK. See the COLFUTURO website for full guidance on funding and eligibility criteria. See our Colombia webpage for guidance on Nottingham's entry requirements for students from Colombia. See the COLFUTURO website for full details of the scholarship application process and deadlines. Offered by COLFUTURO
